message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUCTION_FV_METHOD_INVALID
message.locale: Only Cash and Check methods of receipt are supported for online receipt of payments.
Only Cash and Cheque methods of receipt are supported for online receipt of payments.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_LEDGERNO_AND_CHEQUENO_SET
message.locale: Both Check Number and Ledger Number were specified. Details for 2 different types of Instrument (Check and Cash) cannot apply to a single payment received.
Both Cheque Number and Ledger Number were specified. Details for 2 different types of Instrument (Cheque and Cash) cannot apply to a single payment received.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_NUMBER_COMBO_INVALID
message.locale: An invalid combination exists for the payment received instrument details specified. Please check that a check instrument has a check number or a cash instrument has a ledger number.
An invalid combination exists for the payment received instrument details specified. Please check that a cheque instrument has a cheque number or a cash instrument has a ledger number.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_AMOUNT_NOT_POSITIVE
message.locale: The payment received being captured must have a positive amount.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: Cannot process a Payment Received with a zero amount.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Cannot process a Payment Received with a blank Effective Date.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_LBYREFNUMBER_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid Liability Reference Number entered. Please modify or remove.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_RECEIVEDDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Cannot process a Payment Received with a blank Received Date.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVEPAYMENT_FV_RECVDATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: Cannot process a Payment Received with a Received Date in the future.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_CASH_LEDGER_NUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: A ledger number must be supplied for cash payments.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_CHECK_CHECKNUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: A check number must be supplied for check payments.
A cheque number must be supplied for cheque payments.
